title: Bug 12720Can't DND into nonsource folder in Packages view
description: Build 20020321In the Packages view, I can drag a file from the file system onto a project, apackage or a source folder.However I cannot drag it onto a nonsource folder.I can, however, drag the file onto the project, and then drag it into the nonsource folder from within the packages view.The packages view should allow me to drag a file into any folder, just like inthe Navigator view.
